TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: Tang & F. T. Wang ex L. K. Dai

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 简序薹草 jian xu tai cao

treatment.description: Spikes 10 or more, 1 to few borne in an involucral bract sheath, racemosely disposed. Utricles with rather long beak, obliquely patent at maturity. Fl. and fr. May.
